backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing job posts with add, fetch-by-category, and fetch-by-id functions using an in‑memory map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the scrolling notice ticker and listing related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining extensive color tokens and theming variables for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router layout with sticky header, scrolling ticker, footer, and routes for home and post details.
frontend/src/components/SiteNoticeTicker: Scrolling marquee-style notice ticker component with repeated text and an animated bell icon.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor based on Internet Identity, auto‑refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication provider and hook managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPost.ts: React Query hook fetching a single job post by id using the backend actor with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPosts.ts: React Query hook fetching job posts optionally filtered by category.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind and typography styles with green/orange palette and readability improvements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry mounting React with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with three category sections that fetch and display job posts using React Query, showing loading, empty, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a selected job post, including dates, fees, and important links, with loading and error handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores overall project metadata, requirements, architectural notes, and implemented features for the government job notification site.
